bug.author: cheyang
bug.summary: Fuse in Kubernetes can't be cleaned up
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.0.0-SNAPSHOT Describe the bug delete alluxio-fuse.yaml and recreate agin. It reports <denchmark-code> Normal Scheduled 13s default-scheduler Successfully assigned default/alluxio-fuse-46vtf to cn-huhehaote.192.168.0.110 Normal Pulled 12s (x2 over 12s) kubelet, cn-huhehaote.192.168.0.110 Container image "alluxio/alluxio:2.0.0-preview" already present on machine Normal Created 12s (x2 over 12s) kubelet, cn-huhehaote.192.168.0.110 Created container Warning Failed 12s (x2 over 12s) kubelet, cn-huhehaote.192.168.0.110 Error: failed to start container "alluxio-fuse": Error response from daemon: error while creating mount source path '/alluxio-fuse': mkdir /alluxio-fuse: file exists </denchmark-code>
To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior (as minimally and precisely as possible) Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Urgency Describe the impact and urgency of the bug. Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: shutdown hook to unmount /alluxio-fuse from the host machine seems to be flaky. workaround: umount /alluxio-fuse on physical host directly before restarting fuse daemon
fix to unmount and remount in case shutdown hook fails as part of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/pull/9143>#9143</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/cheyang>@cheyang</denchmark-link> Closing this due to inactivity, please reopen if you still have this issue.
